item.title: 独家报道：消息人士称，通用电气弗诺瓦公司和西门子能源公司正在就为叙利亚重建提供燃气轮机进行谈判
item.description: 三位熟知内情的人士告诉路透社，美国 GE Vernova 公司和德国西门子能源公司正在洽谈为一个价值 70 亿美元的项目提供燃气轮机，该项目旨在重建叙利亚被战争破坏的电力部门。【原文：U.S. firm GE Vernova and Germany's Siemens Energy are in talks to supply gas turbines to a $7 billion project aiming to rebuild Syria's war-damaged power sector, three people familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 新加坡央行行长表示，新加坡将试行代币化纸币，并引入稳定币法律
item.description: 新加坡央行高级官员周四表示，新加坡央行将在明年举行发行代币化新加坡金管局票据的试验，并出台监管稳定币的法律，以推进建立可扩展和安全的代币化金融生态系统的计划。【原文：Singapore's central bank will hold trials to issue tokenised MAS bills next year and bring in laws to regulate stablecoins as it presses forward with plans to build a scalable and secure tokenised financial ecosystem, the bank's top official said on Thursday.】

item.title: 开泰银行首席执行官：泰国经济放缓，开泰银行转向人工智能和审慎借贷
item.description: 泰国第二大贷款机构 Kasikornbank 首席执行官 Kattiya Indaravijaya 周四告诉路透社，该公司正依靠人工智能和审慎贷款来应对经济逆风和欺诈风险。【原文：Thailand's second largest lender Kasikornbank is leaning on artificial intelligence and prudent lending to navigate economic headwinds and fraud risks, its chief executive Kattiya Indaravijaya told Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国库存增加，欧佩克预测改变，石油跌幅扩大
item.description: 周四，油价连续第二天下跌，因为一份行业报告显示，全球最大的原油消费国美国的原油库存不断增加，这加剧了人们对全球供应足以满足当前燃料需求的担忧。【原文：Oil prices fell for a second day on Thursday as an industry report showing rising crude inventories in the U.S., the world's biggest crude consumer, reinforced concerns that global supply is more than ample to meet current fuel demand.】

item.title: 日元受压，股市坚挺，因为美国停摆即将解除
item.description: 周四，随着美国国会投票通过结束有史以来最长的政府关门，股市和黄金暂停喘息，市场等待美国经济数据的恢复，以判断利率前景。【原文：Stocks and gold paused for breath on Thursday as the U.S. Congress voted to end the longest government shutdown on record, with markets waiting for the resumption of U.S. economic data to gauge the rates outlook.】

item.title: 星展银行与蚂蚁金服扩大合作，促进跨境支付发展
item.description: 新加坡最大的银行星展集团与蚂蚁金服国际公司周四签署了一份谅解备忘录，以扩大双方的合作关系，扩大跨境支付和金融科技服务的规模。【原文：Singapore's biggest bank DBS Group and Ant International have on Thursday signed a memorandum of understanding to expand their partnership and scale up cross-border payments and fintech services.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 10 月份就业回升，降息前景黯淡
item.description: 由于企业招聘了更多的全职员工，澳大利亚10月份的就业人数激增，失业率从四年来的高位回落，这也使越来越多的人认为，当前的宽松周期可能已经结束。【原文：Australian employment surged in October as firms took on more full-time workers, pulling the jobless rate down from a four-year high and bolstering a growing view that the current easing cycle may have run its course.】

item.title: 波音公司被勒令向 737 MAX 坠机事故受害者家属支付 2800 多万美元
item.description: 芝加哥联邦法院的一个陪审团周三命令波音公司向一名联合国环境工作者的家属支付 2800 多万美元，这名联合国环境工作者在 2019 年一架 737 MAX 飞机在埃塞俄比亚坠毁时丧生。【原文：A jury in federal court in Chicago ordered Boeing on Wednesday to pay more than $28 million to the family of a United Nations environmental worker who was killed in the 2019 crash of a 737 MAX jet in Ethiopia.】

item.title: 报告发现：大多数新兴国家可调整贸易以抵御美国关税
item.description: 风险咨询公司Verisk Maplecroft的一项研究显示，包括中国、巴西和印度在内的大多数大型新兴经济体都能经受住美国关税的考验，而不会遭受过度的痛苦，这让人们对唐纳德-特朗普总统贸易工具的影响力产生了怀疑。【原文：Most big emerging economies, including China, Brazil and India, can weather U.S. tariffs without excessive pain, a study by risk consultancy Verisk Maplecroft showed, raising doubt about the clout of President Donald Trump's trade tools.】

item.title: 逆水行舟，不进则退：投资者转向澳大利亚小型股，因为蓝筹股的溢价会带来压力
item.description: 基金经理们表示，长期以来，小型股一直被视为澳大利亚股市的 "穷乡僻壤"，但由于强劲的盈利和增长潜力，小型股正在迎来十多年来的最佳发展势头，因为价格高昂的蓝筹股让投资者纷纷到其他地方寻找价值。【原文：Long overlooked as the backwater of the Australian equity market, small-cap stocks are having their best run in over a decade due to strong earnings and growth potential, as pricey blue-chip stocks have sent investors seeking value elsewhere, fund managers say.】

item.title: Banco do Brasil cuts 2025 net income outlook as farmer defaults surge
item.description: 巴西国营银行巴西银行周三下调了对今年调整后净收入的展望，理由是融资支出增加和当地农民违约率上升。【原文：Brazilian state-run lender Banco do Brasil on Wednesday lowered its outlook for adjusted net income this year, citing higher funding expenses and rising defaults among local farmers.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：欧盟旨在加速打击中国廉价包裹
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周三援引贸易专员马洛斯-塞夫科维奇（Maros Sefcovic）致欧盟各国财长的一封信报道称，欧盟呼吁在 2026 年初，即比原定计划提前两年多，对从申银万国、天猫和阿里巴巴等平台在线订购的小包裹征收全集团范围的手续费，以打击每年数十亿美元的廉价中国进口商品。【原文：The European Union has called for a bloc-wide handling fee on small packages ordered online from platforms such as Shein, Temu and Alibaba to be imposed in early 2026, over two years earlier than scheduled, in a bid to crack down on billions of cheap Chinese imports each year, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday, citing a letter from trade commissioner Maros Sefcovic to EU finance ministers.】

item.title: 美国法院暂时阻止美国运输部解除达美航空与墨西哥航空公司合资企业的命令
item.description: 美国一家上诉法院周三晚些时候暂时中止了特朗普政府迫使达美航空公司和墨西哥航空公司在 1 月 1 日前解除合资企业的命令。【原文：A U.S. appeals court late on Wednesday temporarily halted a Trump administration order to force Delta Air Lines and Aeromexico to unwind a joint venture by January 1.】

item.title: Indeed 称，美国零售业假日招聘信息下滑
item.description: Indeed 招聘实验室的数据显示，10 月份与零售业相关的招聘职位（包括酒店、零售商店和食品服务）与去年同期相比下降了 16%，这对重要的假日购物季的消费前景是一个令人担忧的信号。【原文：Retail-related job postings, including hospitality, retail shops and food services, dropped 16% in October compared to last year, according to the Indeed Hiring Lab, a concerning sign for the spending outlook for the important holiday shopping season.】

item.title: 前推特首席执行官阿格拉瓦的人工智能搜索初创公司 Parallel 融资 1 亿美元
item.description: 人工智能初创公司 Parallel Web Systems 由 Twitter 前首席执行官帕拉格-阿格拉瓦（Parag Agrawal）创办，阿格拉瓦在接受采访时表示，该公司已筹集到 1 亿美元资金，用于为人工智能代理建立网络搜索基础设施，并为与在线内容所有者的交易提供资金。【原文：AI startup Parallel Web Systems, founded by former Twitter CEO Parag Agrawal, has raised $100 million to build web search infrastructure for artificial intelligence agents and fund deals with online content owners, Agrawal said in an interview.】

item.title: Edgewell 以 3.4 亿美元将 Stayfree 和 Playtex 背后的部门剥离给瑞典的 Essity
item.description: 美国消费品公司 Edgewell Personal Care 周三表示，已同意以 3.4 亿美元的价格将其北美女性护理业务（包括 Stayfree 卫生巾等产品）出售给瑞典健康卫生公司 Essity。【原文：Edgewell Personal Care has agreed to sell its North American feminine care business, which includes the likes of Stayfree sanitary napkins, to Swedish health and hygiene firm Essity for $340 million, the U.S. consumer products firm said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 交易日 华尔街涨跌不一，停摆（几乎）被否决
item.description: 由于投资者为美国政府结束停摆做好准备，周三美国科技股再度跌宕起伏，但道指却攀升至新高，而油价则因有报道称原油供应量将高于此前预期而下滑。【原文：U.S. tech shares stumbled again but the Dow climbed to a new high on Wednesday as investors geared up for an end to the U.S. government shutdown, while oil prices slumped on reports that crude supply will be higher than previously thought.】

item.title: 美国众议院报告指责中国干预矿产市场
item.description: 美国众议院一个委员会周三表示，中国数十年来一直试图操纵全球重要矿产的价格，将其控制权作为扩大其制造业和地缘政治影响力的经济武器。【原文：China for decades has sought to manipulate global critical minerals prices, using its control as an economic weapon to expand its manufacturing sector and its geopolitical influence, a U.S. House of Representatives committee said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Shah Capital 促成 Novavax 出售，警告代理权争夺战
item.description: Novavax 公司的第二大股东 Shah Capital 正在敦促这家生物技术公司的董事会进行战略调整，包括潜在的出售，并警告说如果在未来四个月内没有任何进展，它可能会发起代理权争夺战。【原文：Shah Capital, Novavax's second-largest shareholder, is pressing the biotech's board to pursue strategic changes, including a potential sale, and warned it could launch a proxy fight if no progress is made in the next four months.】

item.title: 西南航空乐观预计 FAA 将在停摆结束后数日内允许全面排班
item.description: 西南航空公司（Southwest Airlines）周三告诉员工，该公司对美国联邦航空管理局（Federal Aviation Administration）将很快允许美国航空公司恢复全部航班计划表示乐观。【原文：Southwest Airlines told employees Wednesday it is optimistic the Federal Aviation Administration will soon allow U.S. airlines to resume its full schedule.】

item.title: 金丝雀资本申请首只 MOG ETF，推动纪念币发展
item.description: 金丝雀资本公司（Canary Capital）周三向监管机构提交了申请，准备推出一款追踪MOG币价格的交易所交易基金，这标志着在货币管理公司利用加密货币ETF的受欢迎程度之际，MOG币首次获得了监管机构的批准。【原文：Canary Capital filed for regulatory approval on Wednesday to launch an exchange-traded fund that would track the price of the MOG coin, marking a first for the meme coin as money managers tap into the popularity of crypto ETFs.】

item.title: FanDuel 所有者下调盈利预期，将于下月推出活动合约
item.description: 本周三，全球最大的在线博彩公司 Flutter 大幅下调了全年利润增长预期，主要原因是赌客们的又一次长期连胜增加了公司的赔付率。【原文：Flutter , the world's largest online betting company, sharply cut its full-year profit growth forecast on Wednesday, primarily due to another long winning streak by gamblers that increased its payouts.】

item.title: 人工智能热潮刺激网络设备需求，思科上调年度预期
item.description: 思科系统公司（Cisco Systems）周三上调了全年利润和收入预期，寄希望于数十亿美元的数据中心扩建能拉动对其网络设备的需求。【原文：Cisco Systems raised its forecast for full-year profit and revenue on Wednesday, banking on multi-billion-dollar data center expansions to drive demand for its networking equipment.】

item.title: 美联储主席柯林斯称维持政策利率不变 "可能是合适的
item.description: 波士顿联储主席苏珊-柯林斯（Susan Collins）上个月对美联储降低政策利率投了赞成票，她周三表示，她认为近期进一步宽松的门槛 "相对较高"，理由是担心通胀升高。【原文：Boston Federal Reserve President Susan Collins, who voted for the Fed's policy-rate reduction last month, said on Wednesday she sees a "relatively high bar" for additional easing in the near term, citing worries about elevated inflation.】

item.title: 雪佛龙公司表示，预计圭亚那目前估计的石油资源量还有上升空间
item.description: 雪佛龙公司（Chevron）周三表示，该公司预计圭亚那一个富饶油田的可采资源可能超过目前估计的 110 亿桶石油当量。【原文：Chevron said on Wednesday it expects that a prolific oilfield in Guyana could hold more than the current estimate of 11 billion barrels of oil equivalent in recoverable resources.】

item.title: 大众汽车称 Rivian 合资公司的技术未来可应用于内燃机汽车
item.description: 大众汽车集团（Volkswagen Group）周三表示，该公司与美国电动汽车制造商 Rivian Automotive 合作开发的技术最终可能会用于其内燃机汽车。【原文：Volkswagen Group said on Wednesday the technology it is developing with U.S. electric-vehicle maker Rivian Automotive could eventually be used in its internal combustion engine vehicles.】

item.title: 诺和诺德首席执行官在肥胖症交易中释放出新的风险偏好信号
item.description: 9 月底，当诺和诺德首席执行官迈克-杜斯塔尔（Mike Doustdar）得知美塞拉接受了辉瑞公司 73 亿美元的竞购时，他还不准备放弃这家公司及其肥胖症实验药物组合。【原文：When Novo Nordisk CEO Mike Doustdar learned in late September that Metsera had accepted a $7.3 billion rival bid from Pfizer , he was not ready to give up just yet on the company and its portfolio of experimental obesity drugs.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，美国联邦贸易委员会正在调查代理顾问公司 ISS 和 Glass Lewis
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三援引知情人士的话报道，美国联邦贸易委员会正在调查代理咨询公司 Institutional Shareholder Services 和 Glass Lewis 可能违反反垄断法的行为。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission is investigating proxy advisory firms Institutional Shareholder Services and Glass Lewis for potential antitrust violations, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 议员称派拉蒙天舞公司 "搪塞 "调查特朗普批准并购案
item.description: 美国众议院两个委员会的最高民主党人周三表示，派拉蒙天舞公司拒绝回答关键问题或提供与特朗普政府批准该公司以 84 亿美元与哥伦比亚广播公司（CBS News）母公司合并有关的文件。【原文：The top Democrats on two U.S. House of Representatives committees said Wednesday Paramount Skydance had refused to answer key questions or provide documents tied to the Trump administration's approval of its the company's $8.4 billion merger with the CBS News-parent company.】

item.title: 哈塞特若未当选美联储主席，将留任白宫工作
item.description: 白宫经济顾问凯文-哈塞特（Kevin Hassett）周三表示，由于他在美国中央银行的工作经验，他将能很快投入美联储主席的工作，但如果唐纳德-特朗普总统选择了另一位候选人，他将留任现职。【原文：White House economic adviser Kevin Hassett said on Wednesday that he would be able to get to work quickly as Federal Reserve chair due to his experience at the U.S. central bank, but would stay in his current job if President Donald Trump chooses another candidate.】
